Invocation Name: yoga facts
des: Yoga , the Indian heritage helps you to gain positive attitude and lifestyle as well as confidence in life . This Skill similarly helps to know the more about the yoga and will act as the basic interface for you to come closer and fell like you are connected with it. To access this skill you can simply say ' Alexa open yoga facts '. Hope you guys will enjoy this skill .
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
